DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess best method care elder report Adult Protective Services ( APS ) self-neglect . Specifically , study compare APS usual care couple interdisciplinary comprehensive geriatric care APS usual care alone improve health quality live among elder substantiate self-neglect .
